faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqSection.description: Find quick and easy answers to the questions you may have about our services.

faqs.question: Is Sector 16-17 Hisar a good area to rent a shop?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 16-17 is a prime and active area with strong footfall, making it ideal for various commercial businesses.

faqs.question: What types of businesses work well in Sector 16-17?
faqs.answer: Retail shops, showrooms, clinics, offices, coaching centres, and service-based businesses perform well.

faqs.question: Which shop size is best for startups?
faqs.answer: 4 Marla and 6 Marla shops are suitable for startups and small businesses.

faqs.question: Are rental prices higher in Sector 16-17?
faqs.answer: Rental prices may be slightly higher due to demand, but they reflect strong business potential.

faqs.question: Can I find large shops for rent here?
faqs.answer: Yes, 8 to 14 Marla shops are available in selected locations.

faqs.question: Is Sector 16-17 suitable for long-term rental?
faqs.answer: Yes, the established market supports long-term business operations.

faqs.question: Are lease terms flexible?
faqs.answer: Lease terms vary by owner, and many offer negotiable options.

faqs.question: Does Deal Acres verify shop listings?
faqs.answer: Yes, all rental listings are verified before publishing.

faqs.question: Can shops be used for office purposes?
faqs.answer: Yes, many shops in Sector 16-17 are suitable for office use.

faqs.question: How can I get help renting a shop?
faqs.answer: You can connect through the contact section to receive expert rental assistance.
